Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People have taken to social media to express their views on recent political developments. Among the issues discussed were the National Partnership Agreement extending the deadline for Homebuilder applicants the Prime Minister's day off and the effectiveness of the budget. Users also talked about the revenue lost through Stage 3 tax cuts which could fund the JobSeeker rate raise multiple times over. Finally the energy plan proposed by @AlboMP government helped to protect Australian households and businesses from the worst effects of rising global energy prices.
